entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING ENDED, Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:16 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow, -13.2°C

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
